text: DON'T MISS Getting cheeky! Lisa Snowdon, 45, shows off her rear-ly good side as she poses in just a THONG for sexy snap... after revealing she's engaged Peep show! Nicole Scherzinger puts on an eye-popping display as she goes braless in sheer dress at Pre-Grammy gala Justin Theroux wishes wife Jennifer Aniston a happy 48th birthday and shares rare selfie of the couple EXCLUSIVE: Pregnant Billie Faiers showcases her blossoming baby bump as she arrives to her baby shower in slinky blush knit dress while sister Sam oozes style in white suit EXCLUSIVE: Pregnant Amy Childs displays blossoming bump in figure-hugging green midi dress as she makes glam arrival at Billie Faiers' baby shower Food to get you in the mood! Sexy dishes and drinks for Valentine's Day (and why they work) SPONSORED Aphrodisiacs Licking him to the curb! Bikini-clad Bianca Gascoigne flaunts her fab figure as she enjoys sweet treat on sunny break after Jamie O'Hara split SPOILER ALERT: Coronation Street's Toyah Battersby and estranged husband Toby Chapman could be set for reconciliation as actors shoot heart-to-heart by the canal 'It keeps me alive!': EastEnders' June Brown, 90, claims she'll never retire from acting... as she reveals how a Belgian Second World War spy left her heartbroken What a knockout! Ex On The Beach star Chloe Goodman flashes her cleavage in a VERY revealing cut-out bodysuit on racy night out 'I don't have the energy!' Amanda Holden, 45, is snubbing a night of passion for a takeaway on the sofa on Valentine's Day with her husband 'Happiest man alive': Jeremy McConnell finally CONFIRMS he is the father of Stephanie Davis' newborn baby... after taking DNA test on national television What's her trick? Kylie Jenner's 27-inch waist looks impossibly tiny as she wears skintight dress while sitting on a bed Daddy day care! David Beckham dons baker boy hat as he attempts to go incognito in New York while enjoying day out with kids Romeo, Cruz and Harper amid email hacking scandal Baby's first emoji! Blac Chyna's son King Cairo teaches his little sister Dream Kardashian how to send a text message Sheer insanity! Kourtney Kardashian dares to bare in a very revealing dress at Clive Davis' pre-Grammy bash What email scandal? David Beckham is a doting dad in NYC as he takes his brood to Natural History Museum then out for pizza 'I didn't want to get up in the morning': Katie Price speaks candidly about the 'black mood' she was in that led to her drunken meltdown at Christmas 'We miss you everyday': Kym Marsh pays tribute to late son in heart-wrenching post on what would have been his eighth birthday Off to the land of nod? Jessie J flaunts her ample cleavage in plunging pyjama inspired ensemble at Clive Davis Grammy Party Curves on the catwalk! Iskra Lawrence flaunts her envious figure in a orange gown for Project Runway winner Christian Siriano during NYFW Dad-to-be Jay Z parties the day away at star-studded Grammy brunch... while Beyoncé rests at home ahead of first pregnant performance at the awards Busty Chantelle Connelly reunites with racy gal pal Jemma Lucy on night out... after admitting their 'lesbian romance' was a ploy to make CASH Reunited at last! Emma Stone and ex Andrew Garfield spotted sharing a friendly embrace at pre-BAFTA bash... a month after he revealed he 'still loves her' 'It's all lovely and fabulous!': Zoe Ball's relationship with new man Billy Yates gets the seal of approval from his ex White hot! Alexa Chung dazzles in strapless midi dress as she wraps up in leopard jacket leaving Christian Siriano's New York Fashion Week show There could be some sore heads on the red carpet! Amy Adams and Andrew Garfield look slightly disheveled as they lead weary departures from pre-BAFTA bash Brooklyn in New York! David Beckham's socialite son escapes UK amid email scandal as he heads to front row of NYFW 'The show performed extremely badly!': Kylie Minogue's ex-fiancé Joshua Sasse 'left devastated after US show is cancelled due to poor ratings' . Suits you! Meryl Streep wears lacy negligee under a chic blazer at Human Rights event in New York 'Screaming Happy Birthday': Busty Kelly Rowland parties with Beyonce's mom Tina and pal Ciara as she rings in 36th milestone . A model friendship! Pals Sofia Richie and Nicola Peltz sizzle at Alexander Wang NYFW show Shine bright! Rita Ora puts on the glitz as she ditches a red carpet gown in favor of a bedazzled jumpsuit for Clive Davis' pre-Grammy party Mandy Moore stuns in a vibrant off-the-shoulder gown at the 2017 NAACP Awards Sheer bliss! Britney Spears in daring nude mini dress as she leads the style at the Clive Davis Grammy Party...after her niece returns home following ATV accident Never tear us apart: Rebecca Judd shares adorable snap of identical twins Darcy and Tom holding hands... after revealing she thinks they look 'completely different' Peep show! Kylie Jenner wears a see-through bodysuit for date night with Tyga after visiting her NYC pop-up 'She's focusing on the future': Mother-of-three Danielle Lloyd is 'set to welcome her first child with fiancé Michael O'Neill' Thandie Newton flashes a hint of side-boob in a colourful halterneck gown as she attends a glitzy pre-BAFTA dinner in London Back on? Amber Rose kisses ex Wiz Khalifa at Clive Davis' annual pre-Grammy party...after Val Chmerkovskiy split 'Family time': Swimsuit clad Britney Spears bonds with her sons... after her niece returns home following ATV accident What's Gucci? Kim Kardashian breaks all the fashion rules as she steps out in a designer sweatshirt, a fur and a pair of BIKE shorts Hugh Grant, 56, proudly embraces girlfriend Anna Eberstein, 34, as she puts on leggy display in a thigh-skimming LBD at glitzy pre-BAFTAs bash Sam Taylor-Johnson, 49, and husband Aaron, 26, put on a smitten display in cocktail attire as they attend glitzy pre-BAFTA dinner Brunette beauties Emilia Clarke and Felicity Jones look incredible in contrasting LBDs as they lead the glamour at pre-BAFTA party Ripper Street star MyAnna Buring debuts her baby bump in an elegant silk smock as she attends BAFTA nominees party Hannah Bagshawe slips into a figure-hugging leather dress as she joins dapper husband Eddie Redmayne at Charles Finch BAFTA party Rihanna flashes her toned midsection in bold orange and white crop top at Roc Nation's Pre-Grammy Brunch She is nominated for eight Grammy prizes Earning her fashion stripes! Katy Perry adds feminine touch with ruffled blouse as she dons black and white suit to star-studded music event in LA 'Apparently I am uptight': Megan Marx says she constantly shuts down men asking to have a threesome with her and girlfriend Tiffany Scanlon 'They're kissing! They're kissing!' Gwen Stefani snaps a random couple getting married on the beach Lorde rocks 90s chic in plunging black ball gown atop a white T-shirt to Clive Davis' pre-Grammy bash as she pulls funny faces on the red carpet Caped crusader! Toni Braxton makes a head-turning entrance into Clive Davis' pre-Grammy bash bizarre sheer gown and even crazier fake eyelashes Has she found love again? Mel Gibson's ex Oksana Grigorieva sports sparkling ring on wedding hand... seven years after split with director and actor A lesson in opposites! Jennifer Hudson rocks sheer lace pantsuit before slipping into plunging white dress at Pre-Grammy Gala . Adrienne Bailon wows in plunging gown which flashes her ample bosom as she attends NAACP Image Awards with husband Israel Houghton Swinging sixties! Bruce Springsteen, 67, and Steven Van Zandt, 66, prove they haven't lost it as they wow the crowd at intimate Hanging Rock gig Thigh's the limit! Taraji P Henson shows off her sculpted legs in revealing split dress at NAACP Image Awards The brutal side to bikini blogging: Instagram star Sjana Earp reveals her battles with self esteem issues and the pressures she faced because fans only 'see her as a body' Keeping her eye on the ball! Katie Holmes is on the edge of her seat at New York Knicks game At Madison Square Garden to watch the Knicks and Denver Nuggets 'I should be retiring now': Dannii Minogue defends her decision to take time off work... as she reveals why she loves being an older mother Two of a kind! Julianne Hough and brother Derek don full athletic gear for group hike in Los Angeles As a dancer she's expected to be in top physical condition. Playboy model Carla Howe squeezes her ample cleavage into a skin-tight latex dress as she hits the town for night out Pretty Girl! Lena Dunham shows off slimmer figure in silky floral gown as she arrives for pre-Grammy bash with Jack Antonoff She's got some front! Busty Jurnee Smollett-Bell shows off her post-baby body in a plunging dress at the NAACP Image Awards Putting her body on display! Bra-free Kendall Jenner shows off her chest in sheer black top after being spotted with 'beau' A$AP Rocky in NYC Stylish stomp! Gigi Hadid takes some time off from the towering heels of NYFW's catwalks to rock some classic lace up boots Nicole Murphy shows off her hour-glass figure in black gown with silver detailing at NAACP Image Awards Added a cuff bracelet and silver sandal heels. Pregnant Beyonce scoops FIVE major NAACP Image Awards at annual prizegiving... but skips ceremony ahead of her Grammy performance Twinning couple! Pregnant Amanda Seyfried dons matching sweatshirt with fiance Thomas Sadoski while out walking her dog No tears! Amber Rose is spotted for first time since Val Chmerkovskiy split as she wears SLUT hat while taking son Sebastian out All bundled up! Jenna Dewan wraps herself in knee-length knit sweater as she walks with daughter Everly after gymnastics Something to hide? Khloe Kardashian covers her bee-stung lips as she heads into a Beverly Hills tanning salon Her model face! Alicia Silverstone pouts for the camera as she joins Juliette Lewis and Alexa Chung front row at fashion show Staying in The Loop! Liv Phyland bares her toned stomach in printed bandeau top as music show co-host attends Tropfest short film festival That must hurt! Slender Heidi Klum, 43, wears very tight choker around her neck as she hits a salon in Beverly Hills No stroller, no worries: Teresa Palmer flaunts stunning post-pregnancy figure as she takes a morning walk with adorable newborn Forest Sage and two-year-old son Bodhi Rain Feeling smug, boys? CBB runners up Jedward lark around in Dublin... as their predictions about Jamie O Hara 'leading Bianca Gascoigne up the garden path' appear to have come true 'It will be amazing when people stop seeing colour and race': Nicole Trunfio talks about raising biracial two-year-old son Zion amid political tensions Side-splitting! CBB's Jessica Cunningham laughs hysterically as she struggles with her skimpy outfit while partying in a sexy cut-out jumpsuit at London's Café de Paris Hotline Bling-ed out! Drake gets new $100k gold and diamond medallion from celebrity jeweler Ben Baller 'There's no bad blood': Australian film producer Bruna Papandrea laughs off rumours of feud with Reese Witherspoon after the pair dissolved their four-year partnership Newspaper uses photo showing actor Alec Baldwin playing Trump on SNL in story INSTEAD of a picture showing the real deal White hot! Demi Lovato looks ravishing at a Pre-Grammy Brunch as she takes selfies with ex Joe Jonas 'Hugs from this little one': Stephanie Davis shares gushing story-time snap of newborn Caben-Albi... as she DELETES her statement following estranged ex Jeremy McConnell's live paternity test She's got some front! Abbey Lee Kershaw reveals a generous glimpse of decolletage in plunging corset as she attends New York Fashion Week Beach hair in the Big Apple! Kelly Bensimon stuns in black tank top at Son Jung Wan NYFW show C-B-BYE! Bianca Gascoigne channels airport chic in bold red coat and thigh-high boots as she catches flight at Heathrow... after being dumped by Jamie O'Hara Tara Palmer-Tomkinson was in good spirits, reveals the last man known to have seen her before her death Fabulous at 50! Halle Berry proves that age is just a number as she looks young in black dress while at the City Summit in LA 'Morning walks': Selena Gomez flashes taut midriff while wearing overalls in steamy new Instagram photo GIRL ABOUT TOWN: How Simon Danczuk's new fiancée is still married and continues to live with her husband GIRL ABOUT TOWN: Dating Prince Harry for two years killed my dream of stardom, claims Cressida Bonas All about that Bass! EOTB star Nicole flaunts her tanned and toned figure in sexy leather skirt and semi-sheer lace top as she steps out for dinner GIRL ABOUT TOWN: 'Former mistress' of Gordon Ramsay scoffs at the chef's new role as a wedding planner Unlikely new role for Kitchen Nightmares star GIRL ABOUT TOWN: Surprise for London's 'King of clubs' Andre Balazs as he is expecting his third child at 60 'Houston, we have NO problem!': Sailor Brinkley shares topless photo alongside sister Alexa as she plugs Sports Illustrated appearance Pedro Pascal transforms into DEA agent Javier Pena as he films scenes in Colombia for season three of Narcos Hot(date) Bling! Coleen Rooney puts on a leggy display in a chic minidress as she enjoys night out with husband Wayne at Drake's Manchester gig 'My number onesie!': Billie Lourd shares photo with sweetheart Taylor Lautner to celebrate his 25th birthday The Voice's Gavin Rossdale tempts auditioning Keziah Rodell to pick him as her coach by promising her 'Jay Z, new clothes and a makeover' New dad Shayne Ward goes arm-in-arm with girlfriend Sophie Austin... as they enjoy rare date night two months after welcoming daughter Willow Kanye West debuts platinum blonde hair as he steps out in Manhattan... after deleting Donald Trump tweets 'So it's NOT about The Voice then?' Fans slam coaches for not choosing 'incredible' opera singer... only for Will.i.am to see what she looks like, call her back and STILL reject her Amy Adams oozes opulence in an ivory Bardot lace gown as she leads the glamour at star-studded BAFTA nominees party Dakota Johnson covers up as she arrives at LAX, as co-star Jamie Dornan reveals 'pregnancy surge' among Fifty Shades fans 'I secretly keep all my clothes for North': Kim Kardashian reveals her old $4k shoes and $10k dresses are being stored away for her daughter 'He's such a generous actor': New Doctor Who sidekick Pearl Mackie reveals upset over Peter Capaldi quitting after only working on one series of the sci-fi show with him 'It will be one of each': George Clooney's mother Nina says her daughter-in-law Amal is expecting a boy and a girl No one's looking at your eyes! Alec Baldwin's daughter Ireland shares photo from bathtub to talk about her long lashes 'I can't wait to see the finished product': Jennifer Hawkins opens up about building her multi-million dollar waterfront mansion At least one designer likes them! Tiffany Trump and Marla Maples take front row at New York Fashion Week show after top designers flood runways with political statements against the White House Singing icon Pat Boone, 82, blasts Meryl Streep, Hollywood liberals and movie studios that are 'wrecking' US image around the world 'I will have a crack': The Bachelor's Keira Maguire is revealed as an intruder on I'm A Celebrity and vows to 'stir up s**t' by flirting with Kris Smith Quite an eyeful! MIC's Louise Thompson flashes her cleavage in a VERY plunging fuchsia gown as she storms the red carpet at BAFTA nominees party Keeping Up With Vergara! Sofia, 44, says she used to resemble Kim Kardashian as she shares throwback photo with sexy white bikini Megan McKenna looks besotted with beau Pete Wicks at TOWIE filming... amid rumours his EOTB star ex Harriette Harper is in talks to join the show MIC's Jessica Woodley flaunts her sensational toned figure in a series of skimpy bikinis during sun-soaked getaway in Mexico Stanley Tucci, 56, proudly cosies up to elegant wife Felicity Blunt, 36, as he celebrates the premiere of his directorial effort Final Portrait at Berlin Film Festival EXCLUSIVE: 'Maybe another kids one': Tropfest judge Rose Byrne leads the film festival's red carpet arrivals as the Peter Rabbit actress hints she may stick to children's movies for a while PICTURED: Jamie Lynn Spears' eight-year-old daughter Maddie leaves the hospital with BRUISES on her neck after flipping ATV into a pond What a view! Lucy Mecklenburgh shows off her peachy posterior in throwback bikini snap as she jokes 'you don't get the a** you want by sitting on it' Heavily pregnant Ciara dances about her mansion while lip-syncing Whitney's I'm Every Woman on five-year anniversary of Houston's death Piers Morgan and JK Rowling in feisty Twitter spat over presenter's support for Donald Trump's 'Muslim travel ban' (and even Sulu from Star Trek joins in!) Harry Potter star Clémence Poésy makes first red carpet appearance since giving birth last month... as she flaunts her slender physique in black dress at the Berlin Film Festival She's engaged! Teen Mom 2's Jenelle Evans announces beau David Eason has popped the question as she flashes large diamond ring The Hangover star Ed Helms roasts President Donald Trump using only Tom Petty song titles at MusiCares Person Of The Year gala Prince Harry's ex Cressida Bonas cuts a casual figure in a chic black coat and suede boots as she attends pre-BAFTA dinner Making a splash! Playboy vet Joanna Krupa flashes her sideboob as she invites Instagram followers into her bathtub 'We weren't hurting anyone': Geordie Shore star Chantelle Connelly admits lesbian 'romance' with Jemma Lucy was concocted to make money English rose! Jenna Coleman exudes elegance in a floral maxi dress and chic textured coat as she attends star-studded pre-BAFTA dinner Star Wars: Force Awakens actor Oscar Isaac is set to star as double agent Juan Pujol Garcia in upcoming World War II drama Karolina Kurkova flaunts her killer legs in gym leggings and a stylish houndstooth jacket as she steps out in New York 'Nothing better than having my boys in my arms': Devoted dad Jamie O'Hara celebrates reuniting with his three young sons Move over Optimus! Bizarrely named footballer-turned-singer Septimus Prime causes a stir on The Voice... as he reveals the near-death experience that led to his career change She's a cheater! Organic-food fan Kourtney Kardashian binges on potato chips with daughter... after love rat Disick was caught kissing models No time for sex! The Bachelorette's Ashley Hebert and JP Rosenbaum confess during Marriage Boot Camp they're too busy with the kids Love Island's Olivia Buckland forced to defend fiancé Alex Bowen after he attended PA following horrific crash that left her with a fractured skull Naughty girl! Justin Bieber's ex Sofia Richie lifts up her top to flaunt her abs as she models lace underwear during mirror selfie 'Twinning and winning': Ashley Graham and a pal pose in matching cheetah-print bikinis during Swimsuits For All photo session She's got that glow! Mum to be Billie Faiers flaunts her blossoming bump as she promotes new clothing line in chic skintight dress on Instagram Before she was Blac Chyna! Rob Kardashian's fiancée shares throwback photo from when she was 17... and she sure looks different Back with a familiar face! Kendall Jenner has 'beau' A$AP Rocky in tow as she heads to 1OAK in NYC for DJ gig In good spirits Jet-setting Lottie Moss shows off her leggy figure in casual skinny jeans as she heads out in NYC... just 48 hours after attending fashion event in Berlin EXCLUSIVE: Sisters of Madonna's newly adopted twins say their family are thrilled the girls will live a life of luxury as they are left behind in poverty-stricken Malawian village Sweater weather! Victoria Beckham steps out in chic turtleneck knit as she braves NYC's plummeting temperatures following husband David's email hacking scandal George Clooney enjoys relaxed dinner with close friend Rande Gerber in Hollywood... after announcing he and his wife Amal are expecting twins Katie Piper beams as she showcases her enviable style at charity pop-up event in London All smiles Perks of the job! Supermodel Gigi Hadid still wears one of her striking catwalk ensembles as she heads home after stealing the show for Jeremy Scott at New York Fashion Week Aidan Turner cracks a joke on set as he battles against the cold to film third series of Poldark with co-star Eleanor Tomlinson Having a laugh Oh my quad! Jemma Lucy displays her peachy posterior in figure-flaunting dusty pink gym leggings as she performs squats in Manchester 'If it wasn't for Kieran, I would have been dead': Katie Price reveals she was almost drowned by a ferocious wave during Cape Verde getaway with her husband and kids 'Love you so much!': Lea Michele wishes 'best friend' and Scream Queens co-star Emma Roberts a happy 26th birthday Back in black! Justin Bieber covers up in comfortable hoodie as he steps out for dinner... after driving fans wild with his shirtless selfies LBD with a twist! Emily Ratajkowski slips on velvet dress for Jason Wu's 10th Anniversary Midnight Supper during NYFW She's all shuck up! Gigi Hadid flaunts her toned stomach as she sports cropped crystal embellished leather jacket for Jeremy Scott AW17 at NYFW You can't strut with us! Kendall Jenner, Bella Hadid and Hailey Baldwin make for a formidable fashion pack as they parade their way into the Fendi party 'It makes me happy to prove everyone wrong': Supermodel Karlie Kloss opens up about her lesser known career as a coding student Passion for technology EXCLUSIVE PICTURES: Robin Thicke has emotional reunion with son Julian under watchful eye of social worker as ex Paula Patton reluctantly hands him over in park All that glitters! Kylie Jenner flashes her midriff and legs in fringed gold crop top and matching skirt for Jeremy Scott's NYFW show 'I've made mistakes, but I'm trying not to do that again': Geordie Shore lothario Gaz Beadle insists he won't cheat on girlfriend Emma McVey Feeling a bit nippy? Lisa Appleton braves the freezing temperatures as she steps out in nothing but butterfly nipple tassels and pyjama bottoms That's cheeky! Calvin Klein plays This is Not America and Mexican immigrant designer sends 'f*** your wall' underwear down the runway as New York Fashion Week gets political 'He's gone. He's blue': Fadi Fawaz's frantic 999 call reveals that lover had 'been trying to wake George Michael for an hour' after finding him unconscious Mane attraction! Make-up free Rumer Willis shows off her hair extensions as she channels her inner rock chic while stepping out in West Hollywood Meow! Paris Hilton braves snow in quirky cat ear cap after walking the runway for New York Fashion Week Leather look 'Late night sesh!' Make-up free Michelle Keegan flaunts gym-honed figure in black leggings and a vest as she enjoys Friday night workout Hailey Baldwin rocks rose colored glasses and leather for RtA FW 2017 presentation at New York Fashion Week Monochrome EXCLUSIVE: 'I was scared to come back because of my beliefs': Lindsay Lohan on returning to the US while studying Islam and why she wants to meet Trump Justin Timberlake looks focused as he takes his best swing at golf competition... after revealing struggles of balancing career and being a dad 'Grown and sexy': Shanina Shaik flashes MAJOR side boob in slinky black frock before celebrating 26th birthday with an adorable cake of her much-younger self Brotherly love! Nick Jonas looks stylish in khaki coat as he joins trendy brother Joe for night out at celebrity hotspot Craig's Enjoyed a catch-up Bearded Tom Hardy fails to raise a smile as he dines out in Hollywood...after his business 'loses£2M in just ONE YEAR' Saving all my love fur you: Glam Kylie Jenner wraps up warm in chunky coat and knee-high boots as she swaps NYFW for romantic dinner with Tyga Blooming beautiful! Diane Kruger looks sartorially savvy in cold shoulder floral midi-dress as she steals the show at Jason Wu NYFW event Pin-credible! Lily Donaldson flaunts her enviable toned legs in daring thigh-high boots as she attends Fendi NYFW bash 'So excited to shoot with women of all sizes!' Ashley Graham flaunts her cleavage in sizzling salsa-themed ad for her swimsuit line Katy Perry rocks vibrant pink suit in promo shots for her new single... after admitting she has 'given up' caring what people think about her style Daddy's biggest fan! Behati Prinsloo takes baby Dusty Rose to support Adam Levine as he is honored with star on Hollywood Walk of Fame Amir Khan's wife Faryal Makhdoom set to reveal EXPLOSIVE family feud secrets as she's 'in talks with Celebrity Big Brother bosses for next series'... but asks fans on whether to accept 'tricky decision' Two new faces: Chris Pratt and Tom Holland will join Robert Downey Jr and Chris Hemsworth in Avengers: Infinity War 'I would never make a disrespectful comment like that': Drake hits back at claims he forced Muslim fan 'to remove her hijab' at London show Adriana Lima is effortlessly beautiful in bright pink slip dress as she takes her place on the front row at Jason Wu's NYFW catwalk Did I want Bowie's children? Never! A year after his death, Lulu tells of her affair with the rock legend, her troubled childhood - and the car crash that nearly killed her Look away Rob! Blac Chyna spotted without her engagement ring as she enjoys lunch date with a mystery man Kourtney Kardashian shows off her pins in black leggings as she chats on the phone while running errands In LA's upscale Sherman Oaks neighbourhood Big city pretty! Snooki, JWoww and Christina Milian get dolled up at NYFW celebrity beauty bar The pretty celebs were on top forms She even stuns in sweats! Selena Gomez opts for comfort in cozy top and bell bottoms as she steps out in LA Relaxed 'You want to introduce some fear!' Tim McGraw reveals he scares his and Faith Hill's daughters' dates with a sledgehammer 'How pretty is this is?': Eva Longoria shares romantic Valentine's Day balloon display she made for husband Jose Bastón Nice puppies! Lena Dunham dons bold striped frock as she makes Tonight Show appearance with two cute furry guests Can't rain on her parade! Kelly Rowland braves LA downpour to celebrate birthday in showstopping beaded ensemble Birthday weekend 'His and hers': Bec Judd flaunts slim frame in activewear with husband Chris Judd in loved-up snap... six weeks after the pair celebrated their sixth wedding anniversary New York minute! Romee Strijd steps out in super short skirt showing off long legs during chilly NYFW Taking fashion week in her stride Mischa Barton steps out for a rainy day drive in her convertible...one day after 'drinking and smoking until 3 am' at West Hollywood bar 'She's our guardian angel now': Katie Holmes puts on a brave face at Fashion Week as she reveals her grandmother passed away Looking good! Model Elyse Taylor looks radiant as she reveals her beauty secrets include coffee and green juice for breakfast and 60 minutes of cardio FIVE times a week Forget something? Allison Williams wows in sparkly black blazer with no BRA at Get Out premiere in Los Angeles Not worried about over exposure Pregnant Ciara shows off baby bump in skintight mini dress and stilettos while out with Russell Wilson in West Hollywood All smiles Sealed with a kiss! Ariel Winter shares a cheeky peck with her gal pal after getting frisky with fires Briefly locked lips at a Hollywood hotspot Sitting pretty: Charlie XCX shines in pink polka dots at the Variety Portrait Studio event with Noah Cyrus and Kat Graham She was an American Girl! Kate Upton stuns in slinky silk ensemble at MusiCares event honouring Tom Petty 'I want someone who's going to throw me on the bed!': Ferne McCann insists men are put off by her fame... as she reveals she's 'so ready' to settle down and have a baby Another Frantic Friday! The Bangles showcase their youthful appearance thirty years on as they reunite at MusiCares event honouring Tom Petty 'Congratulations to the family': Rita Ora only has 'positive energy' for ex Rob Kardashian after he welcomes a baby with Blac Chyna... despite infamous Twitter spat 'You're literally 99 per cent plastic now!': Fans SLAM Holly Hagan as she unveils new 'filled out' chin in proud before and after snap Nicole Scherzinger puts on a busty display in cut-out blouse for night out at LA hotspot Catch Eye-popping display Busting out! Olivia Newton-John's daughter Chloe Lattanzi flaunts VERY ample cleavage in bizarre video announcement for new movie Second-gen stunner! Andy Garcia's daughter Alessandra Garcia Lorido is a rising talent in the plus-size modeling world A name to watch Daddy's little girl! Tom Hanks' grand-daughter's name revealed as the adorable tot steps out wearing an outfit picked out by father Chet 'Dressing her in gym gear is a cheap ratings stunt!': Corrie viewers SLAM 'nauseating' Rosie Webster as she exercises in a TINY pink sports bra 'He was on the bed, the gas fire next to him': EastEnders' June Brown admits she blamed herself for husband's suicide... as she celebrates 90th birthday and 32 years as Dot Coffee and cigarettes: Fresh faced Frenchwoman Vanessa Paradis stops to smoke after enjoying lunch with friends Diane Kruger looks beautiful in blue as she joins Adriana Lima with a leggy display on front row at Jason Wu's New York Fashion Week show What would the Neighbours say? Gwen Stefani gushes about beau Blake Shelton and pal Adam Levine as the Maroon 5 singer gets a star on the Hollywood Walk Of Fame A Lott of leg! Pixie shows off her toned pins in a ladylike LBD with bow detailing as she leads the glamour at Weinstein pre-BAFTA dinner Kim Kardashian works out with her sisters in LA while husband Kanye West prepares for fashion week in NYC Long distance Courtney Stodden makes out with a mystery man as she confirms she has split from 56-year-old husband Doug Hutchison once again A vision in velvet! Jessie James Decker shows off her svelte figure in burgundy dress with thigh high boots for her Kittenish pop up shop Like a Greek Goddess! Australian Supermodel Nicole Trunfio dazzles the MusiCares red carpet in a unique silk white number She's got good jeans! Rachael Gouvignon flaunts slimmed-down figure in tight denim after posing NUDE in THAT beachside snap Move over Nicole Kidman! Meet Vimala Raman, 37, the girl who grew up in western Sydney watching Bollywood movies and is now one of India's most successful actresses Actor abdication: The Crown creator admits he's 'thinking about recasting everybody' as the plot progresses... meaning Matt Smith and Claire Foy would no longer star in the show 'I want Sophie to stay single': Back in Corrie after a spell on the stage, Brooke Vincent says there's more to her lesbian character than her sexuality 'Strictly made me feel like a woman again': Singer Anastacia's double mastectomy saved her life, but left her with 'a road map' of scars 'Fashionable?' Wildlife warrior Bindi Irwin jokes about her latest 'fashion statement' days after touching tribute to her late father Steve Colour in Kate! Kensington Palace joins the crayon craze with a £5.99 book of the Duchess of Cambridge's outfits that is flying off the shelves 'The older that you get ... less is more!': Makeup enthusiast Kim Zolciak touts virtues of using fewer cosmetics Glam look Mother of all mistakes: Former Home and Away actress Christie Hayes explains why she jokingly admitted to having a favourite child on radio The Lego Batman Movie and Fifty Shades Darker sit atop early weekend box office totals Lauren Pope flaunts her incredible figure and sculpted abs in a bright yellow bikini as she soaks up the sun in Dubai Sultry beach style Victoria(na) chic! Jenna Coleman is the picture of elegance in thigh-skimming frock with pretty ruffle detailing at Weinstein pre-BAFTA party Bella Thorne wears lacy crop top to join mystery man on double-date bike ride with sister Dani Thorne and boyfriend in LA Someone new?
